1.00.name: wordpress/smashwords-book-widget
1.00.description:
This widget displays one or more random book covers of a Smashwords author. It can be used by authors to display their work, by fans or by Smashwords affiliate partners. The author, affiliate and text can be configured. The books can be flipped through as a 'slideshow'.

Please note: This widget is developed and maintained by UnleashYourAdventure, a small publishing house for travel ebooks. We developed it for ourself and our affiliate partners. We offer it as Open Source to give something back to the community. If you find it useful feel free to use it as well!

This plugin is not developed or supported by Smashwords.
